short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically opens the lichess friends list box.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically opens the lichess friends list box. This mimics the behavior that the site used to have in which online friends were automatically visible in the friends list box.
